name: Illusoria
description: Illusoria is a game where players can immerse themselves in a fantasy world full of wonderful characters and terrible monsters. A place where death lurks past every corner and where patience and expertise will be your best allies.
minimum_requirements: 最低: OS: Windows 8 プロセッサー: Dual Core processor メモリー: 1 GB RAM グラフィック: Compatible with DirectX9 with 1024 MB RAM or better (NVIDIA GeForce GTX 280 / ATI Radeon HD 5850) DirectX: Version 9.0c ストレージ: 5 GB 利用可能
